section.title: The &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Event Publication Client Enabler
section.para: The &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Event Publication exposes a JAIN SLEE enabler for applications that want to interact as clients of a SIP Event Publication Server. The enabler does not use SIP network protocols, thus providing better performance and less overhead to network communications.
The Enabler is an SBB that can be used in child relations, with a simple synchronous interface.
